alert.note: Alert for New River Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 1:26AM MST until December 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches between 4000 feet and 5000 feet and 3 to 7 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...New River Mesa. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Road travel could be very difficult due to poor visibility in snow and slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare in advance by having extra food, water, blankets, and a cell phone charger in the vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
